systemPipeShiny 1.1.12

Display a list of links in a row of buttons

Source: R/spsCoreUI.R, R/spsUIcollections.R
hrefTab.Rd

hrefTab can be use for any purpose of shiny. genHrefTab is upper level wrapper of hrefTab and should only be used under SPS framework for fast retrieving tab info and generate the hrefTab. To use genHrefTab, the tab_info.csv config file must be there in config directory. label_text, hrefs must be the same length

genHrefTab(
  tab_ids,
  Id = NULL,
  title = "A bar to list tabs",
  text_color = "#0275d8",
  app_path = NULL,
  ...
)

hrefTab(
  Id = NULL,
  title = "A list of tabs",
  title_color = "#0275d8",
  label_text,
  hrefs,
  ...
)

Arguments

tab_ids

tab names, must have the tab_info dataframe
Id

optional element ID
title

Item title
text_color

Table text color
app_path

app path, default is current working directory
...

other arguments to be passed to the html element
title_color

title color
label_text

individual tab labels
hrefs

individual tab links

Value

a HTML element

Details

genHrefTab require a SPS project and the config/tabs.csv file. If you want to use hrefTab outside a SPS project just use hrefTab

Examples

if(interactive()){
    ui <- fluidPage(
        useSps(),
        hrefTab(label_text = c("Bar Plot", "PCA Plot", "Scatter Plot"),
                hrefs = c("https://google.com/", "", ""))
    )

    server <- function(input, output, session) {

    }
    shinyApp(ui, server)
}
